Class StudyLoan

  • java.lang.Object
    • Loan
      • StudyLoan
  • public class StudyLoan
extends Loan
    Represents a Study Loan, extending the Loan class. This loan type is intended for educational purposes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Loan

        principal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getInstitution()
      Gets the educational institution associated with the loan.
      java.lang.String getStudentID()
      Gets the ID of the student.
      boolean isEligibleForLoan()
      Checks if the student is eligible for the loan based on having a student ID and being associated with an institution.
      void printLoanDetails()
      Displays the details of the loan, including ID, principal amount, duration, loan type, balance, monthly payment, guarantor name, guarantor ID, guarantor income, guarantor contact number, and eligibility for loan approval.

                 Account account,

                 java.lang.String institution,
                 java.lang.String loanStatus)
        Constructs a new StudyLoan object with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        principal - The principal amount of the loan.
        interestRate - The interest rate of the loan.
        duration - The duration of the loan.
        loanType - The type of loan.
        guarantorName - The name of the guarantor.
        guarantorID - The ID of the guarantor.
        guarantorIncome - The income of the guarantor.
        guarantorContactNo - The contact number of the guarantor.
        account - The account object associated with the loan.
        studentID - The ID of the student.
        institution - The educational institution associated with the loan.
        loanStatus - The status of the loan.
